com.xtructure.xneat.evolution
Interface NEATReproductionStrategy<D>

Type Parameters:
D - type of data used in NEATGenomes
All Superinterfaces:
EvolutionObject, ReproductionStrategy<D>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractNEATReproductionStrategy, NEATReproductionStrategyImpl
public interface NEATReproductionStrategy<D>
extends ReproductionStrategy<D>

The NEATReproductionStrategy interface describes the method which produces new child NEATGenomes for a NEATPopulation. Classes implementing this interface will orchestrate the creation of child genomes, selecting which genomes will reproduce and via which of MutateOperator or CrossoverOperator.

Author:
Luis Guimbarda
